snippet: A state by state battle against payday lenders is heating up. | Institutional investors join with activist hedge funds in the push for corporate control. | A court ruling calls into question whether an investment bank should pay the bill in a legal...
abstract: A state by state battle against payday lenders is heating up. | Institutional investors join with activist hedge funds in the push for corporate control. | A court ruling calls into question whether an investment bank should pay the bill in a legal settlement while directors escape with nary a scratch. | The New York attorney general widens an inquiry of high-frequency trading.
